subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: John Isner, the top seed and defending champion, advanced to the semifinals of the Hall of Fame Tennis Championships in Newport, R.I., by beating Izak Van Der Merwe, 6-4, 7-6 (2).
snippet: John Isner, the top seed and defending champion, advanced to the semifinals of the Hall of Fame Tennis Championships in Newport, R.I., by beating Izak Van Der Merwe, 6-4, 7-6 (2).
